text: piṉpu (ātamaip paṭaittu) ātamukku ellāp (poruḷkaḷiṉ) peyarkaḷaiyum (avaṟṟiṉ taṉmaikaḷaiyum) kaṟṟuk koṭuttu, avaṟṟai anta vāṉavarkaḷukku muṉpākki “(vāṉavarkaḷē! Ātamukku eṉ piratinitiyāka āvataṟkuriya takutiyillai eṉṟu kūṟiṉīrkaḷē! Itil) nīṅkaḷ uṇmaiyāṉavarkaḷāka iruntāl (itō uṅkaḷ muṉṉirukkum) ivaṟṟiṉ peyarkaḷai eṉakku aṟiviyuṅkaḷ'' eṉak kūṟiṉāṉ
